segment.source: Apply a View Profile
segment.target: Apply a View Profile

segment.source: Apply a View Profile
segment.target: Apply a View Profile

segment.source: Apply a View Profile
segment.target: Apply a View Profile

segment.source: You can select the way that Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA) opens your recordings by applying a view profile.
segment.target: You can select the way that Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA) opens your recordings by applying a view profile.

segment.source: You can apply the view profile either for all recordings or for a specific type of recording.
segment.target: You can apply the view profile either for all recordings or for a specific type of recording.

segment.source: This includes layout changes, such as closing, docking, or undocking windows.
segment.target: This includes layout changes, such as closing, docking, or undocking windows.

segment.source: You can also select the graphs and data tables that appear on the Analysis tab.
segment.target: You can also select the graphs and data tables that appear on the Analysis tab.

segment.source: Setting the Layout
segment.target: Setting the Layout

segment.source: Whether you want to create a profile that you can apply to specific types of recordings or change the startup profile, you must first set the layout the way that you want it.
segment.target: Whether you want to create a profile that you can apply to specific types of recordings or change the startup profile, you must first set the layout the way that you want it.

segment.source: You can select the windows that appear on the Window menu.
segment.target: You can select the windows that appear on the Window menu.

segment.source: You can move displayed windows, undocking the windows completely or docking the windows in a different location.
segment.target: You can move displayed windows, undocking the windows completely or docking the windows in a different location.

segment.source: You can also drag graphs from the Graph Explorer window to the Analysis tab.
segment.target: You can also drag graphs from the Graph Explorer window to the Analysis tab.

segment.source: You can then use the layout icons to select whether only the graph, only the data table, or both are displayed.
segment.target: You can then use the layout icons to select whether only the graph, only the data table, or both are displayed.

segment.source: Applying the View Profile
segment.target: Applying the View Profile

segment.source: Once you have configured the view layout as you want, you can save the profile to apply later.
segment.target: Once you have configured the view layout as you want, you can save the profile to apply later.

segment.source: To do this, click Export on the Profiles menu.
segment.target: To do this, click Export on the Profiles menu.

segment.source: Later, when you are ready to apply the profile, click Apply on the Profiles menu, select the profile that you created, and then click Open.
segment.target: Later, when you are ready to apply the profile, click Apply on the Profiles menu, select the profile that you created, and then click Open.

segment.source: Changing the Startup Profile
segment.target: Changing the Startup Profile

segment.source: If you want to change the startup profile for all recordings, set the layout in the way you want, and then click Save Startup Profile on the Profiles menu.
segment.target: If you want to change the startup profile for all recordings, set the layout in the way you want, and then click Save Startup Profile on the Profiles menu.
